author: Will Canny
title: Bitcoin Mining Profitability Increased by Almost 20% in May, Jefferies Says
description: The rise in profitability was driven by a 20% increase in the bitcoin price, while the hashrate rose only 3.5%, the report said.
content:
Bitcoin 
 mining profitability rose by 18.2% in May, due to a 20% increase in the BTC price and a modest 3.5% gain in the network hashrate, investment bank Jefferies said in a research report on Mon… [+1141 chars]
